channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Battle over Greenland heats up with Denmark's PM set to visit just days after JD Vance
item.description: The battle over Greenland is set to intensify this week as Denmark's prime minister visits the Arctic island days after U.S. Vice President JD Vance.

item.title: Ten-year Treasury yield below key level as investor calm over trade war unravels
Trump commutes sentence of Ozy Media founder Carlos Watson just before prison surrender
item.description: Ozy had falsely claimed to have deals with Google and Oprah Winfrey before the company and CEO Watson were criminally charged.

item.title: FBI searches homes of Indiana U. cybersecurity Prof. XiaoFeng Wang and wife, seizes boxes
item.description: XiaoFeng Wang's research at Indiana U. focused on security and privacy issues in mobile and cloud computing, and privacy issues in human genomic data.

item.title: Alphabet share-price slump prompts difficult question: Is Google the new Kodak?
Will DOGE's quest to cut government spending mean more money for taxpayers?
What we know and don’t know about Trump's upcoming tariffs
Inside an overburdened — and increasingly understaffed — Social Security office
Trump says reciprocal tariffs will target all countries
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday that reciprocal tariffs he is set to announce this week will include all nations, not just a small group of...

item.title: Trump says reciprocal tariffs will 'start with all countries,' rejects narrower launch
item.description: Some Trump administration officials have suggested that the reciprocal tariffs would be focused on a handful of countries with large U.S. trade imbala...
